properties.entry: INSERT INTO Usuario (correo_electronico ,name, lastName ,password, codigo_activacion ) VALUES (:correo_electronico,:name,:lastName,:password, :codigo_activacion)
SELECT p.correo_electronico, p.name, p.lastName, p.password, p.active FROM Usuario p WHERE p.`correo_electronico` = :correo_electronico

select u.correo_electronico, u.name, u.lastName, u.password, u.active, ur.rol from Usuario u left join Usuario_Rol ur on u.correo_electronico = ur.correo_electronico order by u.correo_electronico, ur.rol
UPDATE Usuario u set active = true , codigo_activacion = null where u.correo_electronico = :correo_electronico"
